sentences.sContent: It is a solid, proven solution for adopting multiple standards -- whether your goal is to conform to the law or to improve your business practices.
sentences.sContent_eng: It is a solid, proven solution for adopting multiple standards -- whether your goal is to conform to the law or to improve your business practices.
sentences.sCn: 它是一个坚固的、已经证实采用多个标准的解决方案，不管你的目标是遵守法律还是改善你的商业实践。

sentences.sContent: ...the absence of girls gives boys the chance to develop without pressure to conform to a stereotype...
...rather than feeling they had to conform to the "boy code" of hiding their emotions to be a "real man"...
...Single-sex education also made it less likely that boys would feel they had to conform to a stereotype that men should be "masterful and in charge" in relationships...

words.tran: 因循守旧；盲从因袭的态度

trans.tranOther: to obey a law, rule etc
